entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives. They are described as being in a state of distress, with Uncle Vernon purple-faced and shouting, and Aunt Petunia trying to comfort Dudley.

entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is one of Harry's Muggle relatives. He is described as being purple-faced and shouting.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is one of Harry's Muggle relatives. She is trying to comfort Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and the spoiled son of Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia. He is described as retching again.

relationships.description: Harry has a family relationship with the Dursleys, who are his Muggle relatives.
The Ministry is notifying Harry that they will be calling at his place of residence to destroy his wand.
